item.title: FAQ
item.description: > How to find the IP of my robot? Check the Find my IP section. > The SDK server is not starting. Check the Debug section. > One of Reachy's motor red led is blinking This means the motor has overheat and needs to cooldown. Turn the robot off, wait for it to cooldown and turn it on again. > One of Reachy's module blue led is blinking This means the module encounter an issue (safety shutdown, incorrect instruction, etc.

item.title: Support
item.description: Discord Join our discord if you have any questions or simply want to join the discussion! ðŸ‘‰ Any questions relative to your development with Reachy?Go to Pollen Community on Discord Pollen Robotics support For any specific questions concerning your robot or if you meet problems with the product, please contact us at support@pollen-robotics.com.
